Cassie_s_Spotify.title: Cassie's Spotify:
Cassie_s_Spotify.question: Alright, alright, DJ CASSIE CAS with the aux cord, trying to get something popping with 3 banging tracks. What we listening to, fam? Say your piece, now.

Doms_s_Decision.title: Doms's Decision:
Doms_s_Decision.question: What to do, what to do... Your boy, Dom, has got a dilemma on his hands - sit with T-Money Tarquin and Hugo, or continue gaming with his A one from day one, Jayda.
options: Are you kidding me, it's gotta be with his bestie, Jayda.
Nah, for real for real, T-Money's got bars, so of course we're sitting with him and Hugo.

Darren_s_Dilemma.title: Darren's Dilemma:
Darren_s_Dilemma.question: Oh dear, Darren's got a dilemma on his hands, doesn't he?  What is he to do?
options: Yes, let Cassie off the bus immediately.
No, Cassie stays on the bus like everyone else.

Afsaneh_s_Dilemma.title: Afsaneh's Dilemma:
Afsaneh_s_Dilemma.question: Yikes, this is not good.  Can Afsaneh get Sepideh to shut the fuck up and save her?
options: Definitely.  Our girl's got the skills.

Decision_Time.title: Decision Time:
Decision_Time.question: Ash is gonna get stabbed either way, and someone's gotta do it.  So, who will it be?
